fields.name: CpuHotAddEnabled
fields.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether virtual processors can be added while this virtual machine is running.

fields.name: CpuHotRemoveEnabled
fields.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether virtual processors can be removed while this virtual machine is running.

fields.name: MemoryHotAddEnabled
fields.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether memory can be added while this virtual machine is running.

fields.name: MemorySizeMB
fields.description: Gets or sets memory size in MBs for the vm.

fields.name: NumCPUs
fields.description: Gets or sets the number of vCPUs for the vm.

fields.name: NumCoresPerSocket
fields.description: Gets or sets the number of cores per socket for the vm. Defaults to 1 if unspecified.
